column4: It is important that everyone in this channel, and other #ubuntu* channels be made aware that it is being publicly logged. But the ops have formed a channel for themselves that they do not publicly log. Why is what is good for the goose not good for the gander? Is this an open source community or not?
no one cares but you, i suspect.
open source does not mean you can "complete and unmitigated access to every moron who asks"
can i have your credit card number, then?
